search: Search for the name of the queue
noDisplay: There is no data to display at the moment
findAccountComment: Already have an account but don't remember the email? Enter it below and we'll check for an existing account.
sitTight: Sit tight while we search our database to see if your email has a reservation with us!
accountNotFoundComment: It seems we couldn't find an account linked to the provided email. Double-check or consider registering if you're new.
accountFoundComment: Great news! We found an account linked to this email. Continue to sign in or reset your password if needed.
goodByeToWaiting: Say goodbye to waiting in queues to finish a single errand
finishErrands: With QMaster, you can finish your errands without waiting a second
saveMoney: Save your money using our exclusive deals and special coupons
spendTime: Spend your time on the important things in life

signupPage.welcomeComment: Let's help you save more time.

loginPage.errorMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
loginPage.failedMessage: Please check your input and try again.

verificationSentPage.verificationSentComment: Check your email for a link to verify your email address
